Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to facilities utilized by the Albany parking authority, compensation of board members, and increases the amount of bonds of the Albany parking authority authorized to be outstanding
Summary: Relates to facilities utilized by the Albany parking authority, compensation of board members of the Albany parking authority, and increases the amount of bonds of the Albany parking authority authorized to be outstanding.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to facilities utilized by the Albany parking authority, compensation of board members of the Albany parking authority, and increasing the amount of bonds of the Albany parking authority authorized to be outstanding
